title.value: Новый комбикорм-концентрат для кормления высокопродуктивных коров в основной цикл лактации
The new concentrated feed for feeding high-performance cows during main lactation cycle
The new concentrated feed for feeding high-performance cows during main lactation cycle

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Romanovich, Zh.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)
Mikulenok, V.G., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: Scientifically-economic and physiological experience is lead to the summer-pasturable period in branch Experimental base Zhodino of the Republican affiliated unitary enterprise on breeding ZhodinoAgroPlemEhlita on highly productive cows of the Belarus black-motley breed with a milk yield 7-10 thousand kg and more for last finished lactation. An animal of skilled group have entered into the basic diet skilled compound fodder with inclusion dry pulp residues, rape oil-seed meal, soya oil-seed meal, fodder yeast, rape oil and adsorbents. The use of an experimental feed and premix during the main cycle of lactation in the summer grazing period allowed to increase the digestibility of nutrients by 1,7-5,8%, diet minerals intake – by 0,12-3,8%, yield of 4% milk – by 10.4% (29.7 vs. 26.9 kg of milk) and obtain extra profit of 946,496 rubles per 1 head for an experience
